name: Room By Room
description:
Fight And Solve Your Way Through A Procedurally Generated Dungeon! Make Your Way Through Over 30 Different Type Of Rooms To Fight The Boss. Along The Way Look Out For The Secret Rooms Contains Shops Or Treasure.

WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

E - Use

Esc/Tab - Menu - Esc Dose Not Work In Full Screen Mode As It Unfull Screens
